title: Home Depot Hit with Lawsuit Over Allegations About Using Facial Recognition Technology
description: The lawsuit, filed in an Illinois court on Friday, Aug. 1, alleges the company uses a form of artificial intelligence called “computer vision” to help mitigate theft by collecting data about customers’ facial geometry in violation of the state's Biometric Information Privacy Act
content:
